title: In Sudan, Women Forced To Line Up For Sex With Soldiers For Food: Report
content: In war-torn Sudan, women are being forced to have sex with soldiers to get food to feed their families, a report by The Guardian said.
summary: In war-torn Sudan, women are being forced to have sex with soldiers to get food to feed their families, a report by The Guardian said.

title: 3 Dead, 16 Others Shot Outside A Nightclub In US' Mississippi
content: At least three people were killed and 16 others were injured after a gunman opened fire near a nightclub in the US state of Mississippi, local media reported.
summary: At least three people were killed and 16 others were injured after a gunman opened fire near a nightclub in the US state of Mississippi, local media reported.

title: If She Wins, Kamala Harris Will Be The First Woman To Become US President
content: Vice President Kamala Harris wasted no time launching her 2024 presidential campaign, seeking the support of fellow Democrats with the backing of President Joe Biden after he pulled out of the race amid concerns about his age and health.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris wasted no time launching her 2024 presidential campaign, seeking the support of fellow Democrats with the backing of President Joe Biden after he pulled out of the race amid concerns about his age and health.

title: PM Modi, Obama, Biden, Putin Walk The Ramp In Elon Musk's AI Fashion Show
content: A post by tech billionaire Elon Musk, showing an AI generated video of world leaders including PM Narendra Modi, US president Joe Biden and Russian leader Vladimir Putin walking down a ramp in futuristic clothing, has gone viral on social media.
summary: A post by tech billionaire Elon Musk, showing an AI generated video of world leaders including PM Narendra Modi, US president Joe Biden and Russian leader Vladimir Putin walking down a ramp in futuristic clothing, has gone viral on social media.

title: All Eyes On AI To Drive Big Tech Earnings
content: Analysts at Wedbush Securities, one of Wall Street's biggest believers in AI's potential, expect "growth and earnings to accelerate with the AI revolution and the wave of transformation" it is causing.
summary: Analysts at Wedbush Securities, one of Wall Street's biggest believers in AI's potential, expect "growth and earnings to accelerate with the AI revolution and the wave of transformation" it is causing.

title: Analysis: How Kamala Harris' Nomination Could Reshape Trump Campaign
content: Donald Trump will try to show swing voters that his likely new rival, Vice President Kamala Harris, has her fingerprints all over two issues he is counting on for victory in November: immigration and the cost of living.
summary: Donald Trump will try to show swing voters that his likely new rival, Vice President Kamala Harris, has her fingerprints all over two issues he is counting on for victory in November: immigration and the cost of living.

title: Elon Musk Reacts After Vivek Ramaswamy's Biden Prediction Goes Viral
content: Joe Biden announced on Sunday that he decided to give up running for re-election as president of the US and endorsed his deputy Kamala Harris to be the presidential nominee of the Democratic Party.
summary: Joe Biden announced on Sunday that he decided to give up running for re-election as president of the US and endorsed his deputy Kamala Harris to be the presidential nominee of the Democratic Party.

title: 'The Simpsons' Predicted It? On Kamala Harris, X User Cites 2000 Episode
content: US President Joe Biden has ended his reelection bid and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris as the new Democratic nominee.
summary: US President Joe Biden has ended his reelection bid and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris as the new Democratic nominee.

title: Nvidia Preparing New Flagship AI Chip For Chinese Market, Sources Say
content: Nvidia will work with Inspur, one of its major distributor partners in China, on the chip which is tentatively named the "B20"
summary: Nvidia will work with Inspur, one of its major distributor partners in China, on the chip which is tentatively named the "B20"

title: Vietnamese Tycoon On Trial For $146 Million Fraud In Corruption Crackdown
content: A former Vietnamese property and aviation tycoon charged with $146 million in fraud and stock market manipulation went on trial in Hanoi Monday, the latest corruption case targeting the communist country's business elite.
summary: A former Vietnamese property and aviation tycoon charged with $146 million in fraud and stock market manipulation went on trial in Hanoi Monday, the latest corruption case targeting the communist country's business elite.

title: 4 New Zealand Deaths Linked To Online "Suicide Kits" Sold By Canadian Chef
content: A New Zealand coroner has formally linked four deaths to the sale of "suicide kits" bought online from a former Canadian chef, according to findings published Monday.
summary: A New Zealand coroner has formally linked four deaths to the sale of "suicide kits" bought online from a former Canadian chef, according to findings published Monday.

title: Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi Yet To Endorse Kamala Harris For Presidential Job
content: Former President Barack Obama, former Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer have yet to make their stand clear on endorsing Kamala Harris for the Presidential nomination.
summary: Former President Barack Obama, former Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer have yet to make their stand clear on endorsing Kamala Harris for the Presidential nomination.

title: "Right Thing To Do": Indian-Americans On Biden Quitting Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden did the "right thing" by dropping out of the 2024 presidential race, prominent members of the Indian-American community have said, noting that this must have been a hard decision for him to make but one he took to put "America

title: As Kamala Harris Joins Presidential Race, Who Could Be Her Running Mate?
content: Hours after President Joe Biden announced his decision to step down from the 2024 race to the White House, Vice President Kamala Harris, in a statement on X, said was "honored to have the President's endorsement"
summary: Hours after President Joe Biden announced his decision to step down from the 2024 race to the White House, Vice President Kamala Harris, in a statement on X, said was "honored to have the President's endorsement"

title: South African Police Uncover Multimillion-Dollar Meth Lab On Farm
content: The South African Police Service (SAPS) and the Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation, known as the Hawks, raided the property.
summary: The South African Police Service (SAPS) and the Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation, known as the Hawks, raided the property.

title: Hours After Biden Drops Out, Kamala Harris Receives $46 Million Donation
content: Democratic fundraising group ActBlue said Sunday evening that it had seen its biggest single-day haul of the 2024 election after US President Joe Biden dropped out and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: Democratic fundraising group ActBlue said Sunday evening that it had seen its biggest single-day haul of the 2024 election after US President Joe Biden dropped out and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: "Lies, Cheats, Rapes": Indian-Origin Billionaire vs Elon Musk Over Trump
content: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk engaged in a war of words this morning after Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race against Republican rival Donald Trump.
summary: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk engaged in a war of words this morning after Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race against Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: Kamala Harris, Trailblazer Eyeing America's Last Glass Ceiling
content: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the US presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.
summary: For years Kamala Harris faced criticism that she was not up to the job of being a heartbeat away from the US presidency. Now, she finds herself feted by Democrats as their best hope to stop Donald Trump's comeback.

title: Republicans Call For Biden's Resignation, Democrats Hail Legacy
content: Leading Democrats were quick to hail Joe Biden's legacy on Sunday after the US president's historic decision to end his reelection bid, while Republicans instead demanded his resignation.
summary: Leading Democrats were quick to hail Joe Biden's legacy on Sunday after the US president's historic decision to end his reelection bid, while Republicans instead demanded his resignation.

title: Philippines, China Reach "Arrangement" For Reef Resupply Missions
content: The Philippines and China have agreed on an "arrangement" for resupplying Filipino troops stationed on a South China Sea reef, Manila said Sunday, after a series of escalating confrontations in the disputed waters.
summary: The Philippines and China have agreed on an "arrangement" for resupplying Filipino troops stationed on a South China Sea reef, Manila said Sunday, after a series of escalating confrontations in the disputed waters.
